rules.name: AGGREGATE_PROJECT_MERGE
rules.description: Recognizes Aggregate on Project and aggregates through or removes the Project

rules.name: AGGREGATE_PROJECT_PULL_UP_CONSTANTS
rules.description: Removes constant keys from Aggregate, pulling constants through

rules.name: AGGREGATE_ANY_PULL_UP_CONSTANTS
rules.description: General form matching any relational expression for pulling up constants

rules.name: AGGREGATE_STAR_TABLE
rules.description: Matches Aggregate on StarTableScan for star schema optimization

rules.name: AGGREGATE_PROJECT_STAR_TABLE
rules.description: Variant accepting Project between Aggregate and StarTableScan

rules.name: AGGREGATE_REDUCE_FUNCTIONS
rules.description: Reduces aggregate functions to simpler forms (e.g., AVG to SUM/COUNT)

rules.name: AGGREGATE_MERGE
rules.description: Merges consecutive Aggregate operations when possible

rules.name: AGGREGATE_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes Aggregate for SELECT DISTINCT or splittable aggregate functions

rules.name: AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES
rules.description: Expands COUNT(DISTINCT x) style aggregates into equivalent expressions

rules.name: AGGREGATE_EXPAND_DISTINCT_AGGREGATES_TO_JOIN
rules.description: Expands distinct aggregates by generating Join operations

rules.name: AGGREGATE_EXPAND_WITHIN_DISTINCT
rules.description: Rewrites WITHIN DISTINCT aggregate functions to equivalent expressions

rules.name: AGGREGATE_FILTER_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Aggregate below Filter when filter conditions allow

rules.name: AGGREGATE_JOIN_JOIN_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes left join input from aggregate when possible

rules.name: AGGREGATE_JOIN_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes join for left/right joins with aggregate optimization

rules.name: AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Aggregate past Join to reduce data before joining

rules.name: AGGREGATE_JOIN_TRANSPOSE_EXTENDED
rules.description: Extended version with aggregate function pushdown capabilities

rules.name: AGGREGATE_UNION_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Aggregate past non-distinct Union for parallel aggregation

rules.name: AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE
rules.description: Merges Aggregate with Union containing another Aggregate

rules.name: AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_FIRST
rules.description: Matches Aggregate only on left Union input

rules.name: AGGREGATE_UNION_AGGREGATE_SECOND
rules.description: Matches Aggregate only on right Union input

rules.name: AGGREGATE_CASE_TO_FILTER
rules.description: Converts CASE-style filtered aggregates (SUM(CASE WHEN...)) to true filtered aggregates

rules.name: AGGREGATE_VALUES
rules.description: Applies Aggregate directly to Values relation for constant folding

rules.name: CALC_MERGE
rules.description: Merges Calc onto another Calc, combining filter and projection

rules.name: CALC_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes trivial LogicalCalc that performs no transformation

rules.name: CALC_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Reduces constants and simplifies expressions inside LogicalCalc

rules.name: CALC_SPLIT
rules.description: Converts Calc to separate Project and Filter operations

rules.name: EXCHANGE_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS
rules.description: Removes constant distribution keys from LogicalExchange

rules.name: SORT_EXCHANGE_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS
rules.description: Removes constant keys from LogicalSortExchange

rules.name: FILTER_INTO_JOIN
rules.description: Pushes filter conditions into join operations or join inputs, reducing rows processed

rules.name: FILTER_INTO_JOIN_DUMB
rules.description: Simpler version of FILTER_INTO_JOIN with less sophisticated analysis

rules.name: FILTER_MERGE
rules.description: Combines two consecutive LogicalFilter operations into one

rules.name: FILTER_CALC_MERGE
rules.description: Merges Filter and LogicalCalc into a single Calc

rules.name: FILTER_TO_CALC
rules.description: Converts LogicalFilter to LogicalCalc for unified processing

rules.name: FILTER_AGGREGATE_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Filter past Aggregate when filter uses only grouping columns

rules.name: FILTER_PROJECT_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes filter operations past projection to filter data earlier

rules.name: FILTER_SAMPLE_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Filter past Sample operation

rules.name: FILTER_TABLE_FUNCTION_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Filter past TableFunctionScan when possible

rules.name: FILTER_SCAN
rules.description: Matches Filter on TableScan to enable filter pushdown to storage

rules.name: FILTER_CORRELATE
rules.description: Pushes Filter conditions into Correlate inputs

rules.name: FILTER_MULTI_JOIN_MERGE
rules.description: Merges Filter conditions into MultiJoin for join optimization

rules.name: FILTER_SET_OP_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Filter past SetOp (Union/Intersect/Minus) to both inputs

rules.name: FILTER_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Reduces constants and simplifies expressions in LogicalFilter

rules.name: FILTER_EXPAND_IS_NOT_DISTINCT_FROM
rules.description: Replaces IS NOT DISTINCT FROM operations with equivalent expressions

rules.name: INTERSECT_MERGE
rules.description: Flattens nested Intersect operations into a single Intersect

rules.name: INTERSECT_TO_DISTINCT
rules.description: Converts distinct Intersect to Union with Aggregate

rules.name: MINUS_MERGE
rules.description: Flattens nested Minus operations into a single Minus

rules.name: PROJECT_AGGREGATE_MERGE
rules.description: Projects away unused aggregate calls from Aggregate

rules.name: PROJECT_CALC_MERGE
rules.description: Merges LogicalProject and LogicalCalc into a single Calc

rules.name: PROJECT_CORRELATE_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes projections into Correlate inputs

rules.name: PROJECT_FILTER_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Project past Filter operation

rules.name: PROJECT_FILTER_TRANSPOSE_WHOLE_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Pushes entire expressions past filter for optimization

rules.name: PROJECT_FILTER_TRANSPOSE_WHOLE_PROJECT_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Mixed expression handling for project-filter transposition

rules.name: PROJECT_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Reduces constants and simplifies expressions in LogicalProject

rules.name: PROJECT_SUB_QUERY_TO_CORRELATE
rules.description: Converts subqueries in projection to Correlate operations

rules.name: FILTER_SUB_QUERY_TO_CORRELATE
rules.description: Converts filter subqueries (EXISTS, IN) to Correlate operations

rules.name: JOIN_SUB_QUERY_TO_CORRELATE
rules.description: Converts join subqueries to Correlate operations

rules.name: PROJECT_TO_SEMI_JOIN
rules.description: Creates semi-join from Project-Join-Aggregate pattern

rules.name: PROJECT_JOIN_JOIN_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes left join input when projection doesn't need it

rules.name: PROJECT_JOIN_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes join for left/right joins with unique keys when projection allows

rules.name: PROJECT_JOIN_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes LogicalProject past LogicalJoin to reduce columns early

rules.name: PROJECT_MERGE
rules.description: Merges Project into another Project, combining column computations

rules.name: PROJECT_SET_OP_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes LogicalProject past SetOp to both inputs

rules.name: PROJECT_MULTI_JOIN_MERGE
rules.description: Pushes Project into MultiJoin for join optimization

rules.name: PROJECT_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes trivial Project that returns input unchanged (identity projection)

rules.name: PROJECT_TABLE_SCAN
rules.description: Converts Project on TableScan for column pruning at source

rules.name: PROJECT_TO_CALC
rules.description: Converts LogicalProject to LogicalCalc for unified processing

rules.name: PROJECT_WINDOW_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes LogicalProject past LogicalWindow when safe

rules.name: PROJECT_FILTER_VALUES_MERGE
rules.description: Merges Project-Filter onto Values for constant folding

rules.name: PROJECT_VALUES_MERGE
rules.description: Merges Project onto Values for constant folding

rules.name: SEMI_JOIN_FILTER_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes semi-join past Filter operation

rules.name: SEMI_JOIN_JOIN_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes semi-join past Join operation

rules.name: SEMI_JOIN_PROJECT_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes semi-join past Project operation

rules.name: SEMI_JOIN_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes semi-join from join tree when redundant

rules.name: SORT_JOIN_COPY
rules.description: Copies Sort past Join without limit/offset for ordering

rules.name: SORT_JOIN_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Sort past Join to enable ordered merge join

rules.name: SORT_PROJECT_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Sort past Project to sort earlier

rules.name: SORT_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes Sort if input is already sorted or order doesn't matter

rules.name: SORT_REMOVE_CONSTANT_KEYS
rules.description: Removes constant Sort keys that don't affect ordering

rules.name: SORT_REMOVE_REDUNDANT
rules.description: Removes redundant Order By or Limit operations

rules.name: SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Sort past Union to enable parallel sorting

rules.name: SORT_UNION_TRANSPOSE_MATCH_NULL_FETCH
rules.description: Sort-Union transposition for ordering-preserving Union

rules.name: UNION_MERGE
rules.description: Flattens nested Union operations into a single Union

rules.name: UNION_PULL_UP_CONSTANTS
rules.description: Pulls constants through Union to reduce computation

rules.name: UNION_REMOVE
rules.description: Removes Union with single input

rules.name: UNION_TO_DISTINCT
rules.description: Converts distinct Union to Aggregate on Union ALL

rules.name: WINDOW_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Reduces constants and simplifies expressions in LogicalWindow

rules.name: JOIN_ASSOCIATE
rules.description: Changes join order based on associativity rule: (A JOIN B) JOIN C -> A JOIN (B JOIN C)

rules.name: JOIN_COMMUTE
rules.description: Permutes inner Join inputs (swaps left and right)

rules.name: JOIN_COMMUTE_OUTER
rules.description: Swaps outer and inner joins (LEFT <-> RIGHT)

rules.name: JOIN_CONDITION_PUSH
rules.description: Pushes predicates from join condition into join inputs

rules.name: JOIN_EXTRACT_FILTER
rules.description: Converts inner join to filter on cartesian product

rules.name: JOIN_LEFT_UNION_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Join past left Union input

rules.name: JOIN_PROJECT_BOTH_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pulls projects from both join inputs above the join

rules.name: JOIN_PROJECT_BOTH_TRANSPOSE_INCLUDE_OUTER
rules.description: Same as above but including outer joins

rules.name: JOIN_PROJECT_LEFT_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pulls project from left join input above the join

rules.name: JOIN_PROJECT_LEFT_TRANSPOSE_INCLUDE_OUTER
rules.description: Same as above but including outer joins

rules.name: JOIN_PROJECT_RIGHT_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pulls project from right join input above the join

rules.name: JOIN_PROJECT_RIGHT_TRANSPOSE_INCLUDE_OUTER
rules.description: Same as above but including outer joins

rules.name: JOIN_PUSH_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Pushes expressions in equality conditions into join inputs

rules.name: JOIN_PUSH_TRANSITIVE_PREDICATES
rules.description: Creates Filters from transitive predicates (if A=B and B=C, then A=C)

rules.name: JOIN_REDUCE_EXPRESSIONS
rules.description: Reduces constants and simplifies expressions in Join condition

rules.name: JOIN_RIGHT_UNION_TRANSPOSE
rules.description: Pushes Join past right Union input

rules.name: JOIN_TO_CORRELATE
rules.description: Converts LogicalJoin to LogicalCorrelate for correlated processing

rules.name: JOIN_TO_MULTI_JOIN
rules.description: Flattens LogicalJoin tree to MultiJoin for global join ordering

rules.name: JOIN_TO_SEMI_JOIN
rules.description: Creates semi-join from Join with empty Aggregate (existence check)

rules.name: JOIN_ADD_REDUNDANT_SEMI_JOIN
rules.description: Adds semi-join to Join for improved filtering

rules.name: JOIN_CONDITION_EXPAND_IS_NOT_DISTINCT_FROM
rules.description: Replaces IS NOT DISTINCT FROM in join conditions with equivalent expression

rules.name: MULTI_JOIN_BOTH_PROJECT
rules.description: Pulls projects from both MultiJoin inputs

rules.name: MULTI_JOIN_LEFT_PROJECT
rules.description: Pulls project from left MultiJoin input

rules.name: MULTI_JOIN_RIGHT_PROJECT
rules.description: Pulls project from right MultiJoin input

rules.name: MULTI_JOIN_OPTIMIZE
rules.description: Re-orders Join tree using heuristic planner algorithm

rules.name: MULTI_JOIN_OPTIMIZE_BUSHY
rules.description: Re-orders Join tree for bushy join trees using heuristic algorithm

rules.name: COERCE_INPUTS
rules.description: Pre-casts inputs to particular types for type compatibility

rules.name: SAMPLE_TO_FILTER
rules.description: Rewrites Bernoulli Sample to Filter with random condition

rules.name: LIMIT_MERGE
rules.description: Merges consecutive Sort operations representing Limit semantics

rules.name: SUBQUERY_REMOVE
rules.description: Decorrelates subqueries by converting them to joins (alias for PROJECT_SUB_QUERY_TO_CORRELATE)

rules.name: FK_JOIN_ELIMINATION
rules.description: Removes redundant dimension joins that only validate foreign keys; adds IS NOT NULL checks
